tool.name: snippy-core

param.name: indirs
param.label: Snippy input zipped dirs
param.help: Select all the snippy inputs for alignment

param.name: is_reference
param.label: Exclude reference
param.help: Don't include the reference file in the alignment.

tool.help:
Synopsis:
Combine multiple Snippy outputs into a core SNP alignment
Options:
--noref! Exclude reference (default '0').
Note:
snippy **must** have been run with --cleanup False
